block.p: An article yesterday about the United States' intentions to request a waiver of immunity for a Georgian diplomat involved in a fatal car crash in Washington included an erroenous report from the State Department about a New York City police investigation of a recent incident involving diplomats. A report from the New York police about the incident involving two Russian and Belarussian diplomats in fact reached the State Department, on Friday.

A report from the New York police about the incident involving two Russian and Belarussian diplomats in fact reached the State Department, on Friday.
